title: Lambda to SNS to SQS to Lambda
description: Creates one Lambda function that sends a message to an SNS topic. That topic sends the message to a SQS queue and finally another Lambda picks the message.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This sample project demonstrates how to create a SNS + SQS system, in which all the messages sent by a publisher are sent to all the consumers, and there is a buffer between the message producer and the consumer. In this way the consumers don't get overload with messages.
See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.
